transcript: What do you mean? He lived next door to the girl all his life. Why shouldn't he want to see her again? No, don't look at me like that. He didn't tell me any more than he told you

segments.text: What do you mean? He lived next door to the girl all his life. Why shouldn't he want to see her again?
No, don't look at me like that. He didn't tell me any more than he told you

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: What did you mean? He lived next door to the girl all of his life, why wouldn't he want to see her again? Don't look at me like that, he didn't tell me any more than he told you.
